name: places/ChIJgan9aMVYwokRxX8MYAwRV6Y
formattedAddress: 686 Main St #0021, New York, NY 10044, USA
adrFormatAddress: 686 Main St #0021, New York, NY 10044, USA

editorialSummary.text: Supermarket chain stocking meats, seafood, produce, dairy & baked goods, deli items & more.

originalText.text:
The service here can be disappointing. They have a couple of long-time cashiers that are wonderful and very attentive. However, several of the young women they have hired recently need to get off their phones!!! Teach them customer service and don’t allow your employees to eat at the register!!!

The managers standby and do nothing. If you see the checkout lines backing up, help out!! The management is the worst!! Prices are a close second. Even though this store is a block from my apartment I actually go out of my way to buy groceries elsewhere because I don’t want to give you money for overpriced staples and inconsistent service. Get a clue!

originalText.text: Good spot for basic grocery, especially for people who live in the northern area of the island. They changed some of their brands (no more ShopRite), but still I find most of their products are way overpriced. The manager is nice and ready to help, but some people at the cashier are quite rude

text.text: Good spot for basic grocery, especially for people who live in the northern area of the island. They changed some of their brands (no more ShopRite), but still I find most of their products are way overpriced. The manager is nice and ready to help, but some people at the cashier are quite rude

originalText.text:
Mediocre quality all around. Prices are pretty darn steep. I'd honestly say to wait for the Saturday Farmer's market to get some of your groceries. The produce here isn't the freshest. The only cheaper item here I've seen here is the off brand Lactose free milk here for $0.90 cheaper than the other groceries here on the island. Other than that, overpriced.

You're honestly better off ordering groceries online from Amazon and getting the box delivered to your door step. Dairy items of course from a store. Produce from the farmers market.

Just to mention, I've never had a bad experience with the staff here.

originalText.text: Came over to RI this morning to drop someone off and wait for them. Decided to check out Gristede's and pick up a few things while I waited. NOT HAPPENING. The store is a mess, looks like it needs an upgrade. Lots of space with nothing in it; broken display cases and empty old shelves are what you see. ALL ITEMS ARE OVERPRICED with very limited variety. This is nothing like the Gristede's I remember seeing in other boroughs years ago. I think it needs an overhaul and probably a new supermarket  entirely. There are lots of others that would probably give much better service and product  assortment to the RI residents and of course better prices.The residents deserve more; especially since it is the only supermarket on the island. I am hopeful that within the new year they are shut down and a new supermarket  is on the agenda.

originalText.text:
Many expired items. Extremely high prices, why?
If they had good quality & competitive prices maybe they wouldn’t lose business to fresh direct & other supermarket delivery service. We’ll see if Foodtown is any better.
